Details

A simple browser-based decibel meter that uses your device’s microphone to measure sound levels. This tool provides a visual representation of ambient noise with corresponding descriptions of different noise levels.

Features

  • Real-time sound level monitoring
  • Visual meter with color-coded levels
  • Description of current noise level (whisper, conversation, traffic, etc.)
  • Easy to use interface with start/stop button
  • Color-coded legend explaining different sound levels

Technical Notes

  • Uses the Web Audio API to access microphone data
  • Provides approximate decibel measurements (calibration would be required for precise readings)
  • Works best on desktop/mobile browsers with HTTPS or localhost (required for microphone access)
  • No data is stored or transmitted - all processing happens locally in your browser
